T02D1778:272a-1: shr'i ma h'a k'a l'ashta mantra sto tra n'a ma /
T02D1778:272a-3: dpal nag po chen po'i bstong pa rkang pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba /
T02D1778:272b-0: @272b dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1778:272b-1: aom grub par gyur cig /'byung po ro langs tshogs
T02D1778:272b-2: rnams ha ha h'um dang ki li ki li zhes
T02D1778:272b-4: sku la rgyu ma'i phreng bas kun nas bklubs shing zhal du mi yi sha ni gsol mdzad cing //
T02D1778:272b-5: 'dod pa'i gzugs dang mi sdug gzugs can kha tv'am gar bcas phyag g-yon mi yi thod pa bsnams //
T02D1778:272b-6: spyan dmar smin ma ser zhing mche gtsigs ro yi gnas la dgyes pa'i zhing skyong khyod kyis srungs //
T02D1778:272b-7: phem phem phem zhes sgrogs par byed cing so sor bskyod pa'i me dpung chen po'i dbus na ni //
T02D1778:272b-8: mgo bo rnams kyis mgo yi phreng byas rab gsal 'jigs pa'i skur brgyan gshin rje dang mtshungs shing //
T02D1778:272b-9: drag shul phyag gi dang po rnams kyis mi mgo ma lus 'dzin cing khrag skyugs bab pa gsol //
T02D1778:272b-10: rol pas rol pa sel zhing me yis gang ba'i gnas la zhing skyong khyod kyis srung bar mdzod //
T02D1778:272b-11: ksham ksham ksham zhes bzong [*bzod?] pa'i sku can ca
T02D1778:272b-12: co sgrogs par byed pa'i gdug pa rnams bzung ste
T02D1778:272b-13: // gcig bu gnon cing mnan nas ka ha ka
T02D1778:272b-14: ha brjod cing char sprin sngon po yi ni mdog
T02D1778:272b-15: / trim ksh'im shr'i yi sngags kyis gdug can pa
T02D1778:272b-16: tsa pa tsa'i rigs kyi sngags kyis kun nas sreg
T02D1778:272b-17: / bgegs rnams rab tu bskrad par mdzod cig sgrub
T02D1778:272b-18: po rnams kyi zhing gnas nges par zhing skyong mdzod
T02D1778:272b-19: // // gang zhig dus rnams kun du hi ta
T02D1778:272b-20: ta zhes bzhad pa'i sgra yis shin tu 'jigs mdzad
T02D1778:272b-21: // // cing // phyugs rnams kyi ni sngags dang
T02D1778:272b-22: bgegs 'jig nyi ma re re dri med brnyes pa
T02D1778:272b-23: chu 'dzin mdog / h'um h'um phat ces drag po'i
T02D1778:272b-24: sgra yis srid pa gnyis po'i khong ni ma lus
T02D1778:272b-26: dang ni sma ra ser zhing nye bar spyod pa'i
T02D1778:272b-27: zhing skyong khyod kyis srung bar mdzod //
T02D1778:272b-28: kham kham kham zhes phyag g-yas gri gug ral gris bgegs rnams la rol khrag 'thung ba la dges //
T02D1778:272b-29: ram ram ram zhes spyan dmar du ru ru zhas phyag ni khrag gis brgyan cing gtum pa'i shugs //
T02D1778:272b-30: krum krum krum zhes khros pa'i spyan gyis gzigs par mdzad cing bgegs rnams khyod kyis sgyur bar mdzad //
T02D1778:272b-31: dam dam dam zhes 'di yis 'dul mdzad rngam dang gtum dang bcas pa'i zhing skyong khyod kyis srungs //
T02D1778:273a-1: bas dgra bo nyon mongs pa rnams nges par nyon
T02D1778:273a-2: mongs par mdzod cig / kam kam kam zhes thod
T02D1778:273a-3: pa'i phreng bas sku la spras shing nag po'i mthu
T02D1778:273a-5: tsam tsam tsam zhes gtum pa'i shugs kyis rab g-yo rmad du byung bas 'jig rten snang mdzad cing //
T02D1778:273a-6: sam sam sam zhes tshogs pa'i bdag nyid dam tshig thos 'dzin zhing skyong gang yin khyod kyis skyongs //
T02D1778:273a-7: yam yam yam zhes sna tshogs gshin rje ltar 'gro dri ma med pa'i chu bzhin gzigs mdzad cing //
T02D1778:273a-8: bam bam bam zhes rlung gi shugs kyis myur du rgyu zhing nyon mongs 'jig rten skyong ba mnyes //
T02D1778:273a-9: bam bam bam zhes 'jigs pa'i khro gnyer mchog gi 'jigs mdzad nus pa'i kha gdangs sha za zhing //
T02D1778:273a-10: ksham ksham ksham zhes phan par mdzad cing gnod pa skad cig gis sel zhing skyod khyod kyis skyongs //
T02D1778:273a-11: klam klim klum zhes gdug pa'i gzugs kyis srid gsum nyin mtshan dus kun nyon mongs gyur pa gang //
T02D1778:273a-12: pam pam pam zhes thugs rje'i zhags pas byol song rnams 'dzin phyag gis gdul bya rnams skyong ba //
T02D1778:273a-13: sngags bdag sngags kyi sku can blo yi sngags pa rnams la blo gros 'bras bu mtshungs med ster //
T02D1778:273a-14: zhing rnams srung bar mdzad pa khyod kyis 'gro ba'i lus rnams ma lus yun ring bskyad du gsol //
T02D1778:273a-15: sgrub pa po yi slob dpon blo ldan dam tshig thos 'dzin gang zhig gus pa dang ldan pas //
T02D1778:273a-16: thun gnyis su ni sngags rnams brgyad po klog byed de ni bsod nams ldan par 'gyur ba dang //
T02D1778:273a-17: sa stengs dang ni mtho ris su ni de yi rtag tu bgegs rnams rtag tu nyams 'gyur zhing //
T02D1778:273a-18: tshe dang dpal dang grags dang 'byor 'dzin stengs dang mthu dang gzi brjid rgyas par mtshungs med 'gyur //
T02D1778:273a-19: dpal nag po chen po la bstod pa rkang pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba /
